ref: 6721 dhanikā f. ʻ virtuous woman, wife ʼ lex. [Cf. dhanika- ʻ virtuous ʼ, m. ʻ husband ʼ lex.: sanskritization of Pk. dhaṇia -- ʻ praiseworthy ʼ < dhánya -- (metr. dhánia -- ) ʻ rich ʼ RV., ʻ having or bringing good fortune ʼ MBh., ʻ virtuous ʼ lex., dhanyā -- f. ʻ name of Dhruva's wife ʼ VP. <-> dhána -- ]
Pk. dhaṇiā -- f. ʻ praiseworthy wife ʼ;
H. poet. dhani f. ʻ young woman ʼ.
